add_library(zlib UNKNOWN IMPORTED GLOBAL)

set_target_properties(zlib PROPERTIES
	IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/zlib.lib")

foreach(CONFIG ${CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES})
	file(COPY "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/zlib.dll" DESTINATION ${CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY}/${CONFIG})
endforeach()
